stimulusHtml: Which of the following would best support the conclusion that the Columbian Exchange involved more profound consequences than did earlier biological exchanges in world history?
choicesHtml: Previous exchanges did not involve societies at radically different levels of technological development.
Previous exchanges did not involve the worldâ€™s two hemispheres.
The Columbian Exchange involved the peaceful transfer of animals, plants, and diseases.
The Columbian Exchange was accompanied by the spread of missionary religions.
